ResourceHeader.Description: The Fluxgate Magnetometer instrument at the Kakioka geomagnetic observatory.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mituko Ozima, Kakioka Magnetic Observatory, Kakioka, Yasato-machi (Niihari-gun, Ibaraki ken, 315-0116 Japan) for use of data from the Kakioka Magnetometer instrument.
